QuestData.Title: Return to Sathiel
QuestData.Description: It all checks out as far as I can tell.$B$BSo, the question is, have you already spoken to Skymaster Brightdawn in Fairbreeze Village? If so, then this can be as simple as you paying the small fare and quickly flying back.$B$BLet me know when you're ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Purchase a flight back to Fairbreeze Village in Eversong Woods and deliver Sathiel's Goods to Sathiel.
QuestData.CompletionText: $C, back so soon? That doesn't look like everything I requested...
QuestData.RewardText: Well, I guess if he said that the rest of it will be coming quickly overland, then I'll take him at his word. He's certainly never failed to provide the goods in the past.$B$BThank you, $N. Here take this coin... it's done nothing but jingle around in my pocket all day.
